BBEX3.A.TZS.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the United Republic of Tanzania / USD 1 = TZS ... (selling)
Source: Bank of Tanzania, Dar es Salaam
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 1984: On 15 June 1984, the exchange rates were adjusted more sharply. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate): 14 June 1984: USD 1 = TZS 12.5831 / 12.6629 16 June 1984: USD 1 = TZS 17.0197 / 17.1269 Calculated devaluation: 26.1%.
Comment on 1986: From April to June 1986, the Tanzania shilling, which is pegged to a currency basket, was devalued in several stages.

Comment on 1988: On 5 November 1988, the exchange rates were adjusted more sharply. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate): 4 November 1988: USD 1 = TZS 98.6715 / 99.6637 7 November 1988: USD 1 = TZS 119.3997 / 120.6003 Calculated devaluation: 17.4%.

Comment on 1989: On 3 December 1989, the exchange rates were adjusted more sharply. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate): 2 December 1989: USD 1 = TZS 156.6547 / 158.2297 3 December 1989: USD 1 = TZS 189.0497 / 190.9503 Calculated devaluation: 17.1%.
